a-da-ma
da-a-ra-ya-va-u-sha
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
va-a-ra-ka
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya-a-na-a-ma
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
pa-a-ra-sa-i-ya
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
da-ha-ya-u-na-a-ma
va-sha-ta-a-sa-pa-ha-ya-a
pa-
da-a-ra-ya-va-u-sha
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
va-za-ra-ka
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya-a-na-a-ma
xa-sha-a-ya-a-ya-tha-i-ya
da-ha-ya-u-na-a-ma
va-i-sha-ta-a-sa-pa-ha-ya-a
pa-u-sra
ha-xa-a-ma-na-i-sha-i-ya
ha-ya
i-ma-ma
ta-sra-ra-ma
a-ka-u-na-sha-
xa-sha-ya-a-ra-sha-a
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
va-za-ra-ka
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya
xa-sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya-a-na-a-ma
da-a-ra-ya-va-ha-u-sha
sha-a-ya-tha-i-ya-ha-ya-a
pa-u-sra
ha-xa-a-ma-na-i-sha-i-ya
